mapper.select: select i.image_id as imageId, i.owner_id as ownerId, i.images_type as imagesType, i.server, i.path, i.image_name as imageName, i.image_desc as imageDesc, i.type, i.sort, i.create_time as createTime, i.file_size as fileSize from mc_images i where i.owner_id = #{ownerId} order by i.image_name asc

select i.image_id as imageId, i.owner_id as ownerId, i.images_type as imagesType, i.server, i.path, i.image_name as imageName, i.image_desc as imageDesc, i.type, i.sort, i.create_time as createTime, i.file_size as fileSize from mc_images i where i.owner_id = #{0} and i.type = #{1}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_images ( image_id, owner_id, images_type, server, path, image_name, image_desc, type, sort, create_time, file_size ) VALUES ( #{imageId}, #{ownerId}, #{imagesType}, #{server}, #{path}, #{imageName}, #{imageDesc}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{createTime}, #{fileSize} )
